buildConditions

public static java.util.List<Condition> buildConditions(org.json.JSONArray conditionsArray)
                                                 throws org.json.JSONException,
                                                        java.io.IOException
Every statement of the conditions has to follow this rules:
  • Subject must be a variable
  • Predicate must be a URI
  • Object can be a variable or a URI

Parameters:
conditionsArray -
Returns:
list of constructed conditions

org.json.JSONException
